1.title: Oversteer: The Party Drug of Driving
1.plot: Donuts. Powerslides. Dukes of Hazzard stuff. What do these all result from? Oversteer. Pro driver Randy Pobst shows you what over-steer is all about.

2.title: Passing: Know How to Dominate
2.plot: In racing, it's the art of telling someone that you're better than them. That's right, we're talking about passing. Pro driver Randy Pobst shows you what passing is all about.

3.title: Shifting: Don't Be a Shift Knob
3.plot: In racing, it's the art of keeping an engine in its power band. That's right, we're talking about shifting. Pro driver Randy Pobst shows you what passing is all about.

4.title: The Racing Line: The Only Line You Need
4.plot: It's the fastest way around the track and it also happens to be the name of the show. That's right, you guessed it. Pro driver Randy Pobst teaches you all about the racing line.

5.title: Braking: Brake Yourself Fool
5.plot: It creates the most G's on a race track. What am I talking about? That's right, you guessed it. Randy Pobst teaches you all about BRAKING.

6.title: The Skidpad: Slave to the Limit
6.plot: It's the best way to learn how to control a car. What am I walking about? That's right, you guessed it. Pro driver Randy Pobst teaches you all about the skid pad.

7.title: Street Tires vs Track Tires: Oooooh That Sticky Icky
7.plot: We all know tires meant for the racetrack are faster, but why and by how much? MOTOR TREND's resident hot shoe Randy Pobst and BFGoodrich Pro Driver Kyle Tucker strap themselves into the Ford Mustang GT to find out.

8.title: Understeer: Your Overprotective Mother
8.plot: When driving cars at the limit, there's one thing that can be as frustrating as an overprotective mother. Too much under steer. You'll learn the tools for coping with a car that won't turn.

9.title: FWD vs RWD vs AWD: Know How to Handle Your Junk!
9.plot: Front-wheel drive, rear-wheel drive, and all-wheel drive-we all know they are different, but how do they affect the handling of each car? Randy Pobst takes out the Mazda Miata, Ford Focus ST, and Subaru WRX STI to find out.

10.title: Smooth vs. Aggressive
10.plot: Which is the best driving style for getting around the track one time, smooth or aggressive? We hit the track with two Spec Miata race cars to find out. The Racing Line is the new performance driving series hosted by pro driver Randy Pobst. Come along for the ride as Randy hits the racetrack to teach you the fundamentals of driving fast.

11.title: Pushing Your Weight Around
11.plot: As a race car driver, it's your job to control the car's weight. If you don't, you're going to find yourself at the back of the pack. Pro racer Randy Pobst shows you the secrets of managing the weight of the car to achieve the fastest lap times. Helping him explain this concept is weight management professional and Sumo World Champion, Ulambayaryn Byambajav.

12.title: Humps and the Bumps
12.plot: Randy takes the role of the student and learns off-road-driving techniques from BFG Pro Driver John Williams. Will Randy still be the fastest man when he's out of his element? Watch to find out.

imdb.title: The Racing Line
plot: Come along for the ride as pro driver and Motor Trend hot shoe Randy Pobst hits the racetrack to teach you the fundamentals of driving fast.
